Title: IBM misses first-quarter revenue estimates as corporate IT spending shrinks
Short Description: IBM Corp missed Wall Street expectations for first-quarter revenue on Wednesday, hurt by shrinking corporate spending on IT services and a strong dollar.

Title: GlobalFoundries sues IBM, says trade secrets were unlawfully given to Japan's Rapidus
Short Description: Chip manufacturer GlobalFoundries Inc said on Wednesday it had filed a lawsuit against International Business Machines Corp , accusing it of unlawfully sharing confidential intellectual property and trade secrets.

Title: IBM to cut 3,900 jobs - Bloomberg News
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp will cut 3,900 roles, or about 1.5% of its global workforce, its chief financial officer, James Kavanaugh, told Bloomberg News in an interview on Wednesday.

Title: IBM reports highest annual revenue growth in a decade
Short Description: IBM Corp on Wednesday reported its highest annual revenue growth in a decade and beat Wall Street expectations for the fourth quarter as more businesses looked to optimize their operations and save costs amid an economic downturn.

Title: IBM launches its most powerful quantum computer with 433 qubits
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp on Wednesday said it launched its most powerful quantum computer to date called the Osprey, a 433-qubit machine that has three times the number of qubits than its Eagle machine announced last year.

Title: IBM expects to exceed annual revenue target on resilient cloud momentum
Short Description: IBM Corp beat quarterly revenue estimates on Wednesday and said it expects to exceed full-year revenue growth targets as robust demand for its digital services helps cushion the blow from a strong dollar.

Title: Biden to tout IBM's $20 billion investment in New York over next decade
Short Description: President Biden on Thursday will tout IBM Corp's plans to invest $20 billion in New York over the next decade in development and manufacturing of semiconductors, mainframe technology, artifical intelligence and quantum computing.

Title: IBM beats quarterly revenue estimates, warns of $3.5 bln forex hit
Short Description: IT hardware and services company IBM Corp beat quarterly revenue expectations on Monday but warned that the hit from forex for the year could be about $3.5 billion due to a strong dollar.

Title: IBM winding down Russian operation, laying off employees - memo
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp is winding down its business in Russia and has started to lay off its employees in the country, according to a memo to staff sent last week and emailed to Reuters on Tuesday.

Title: Story on IBM ceasing operations in Russia is withdrawn
Short Description: A Reuters story quoting Russia's RIA Novosti as saying IBM will cease operations in Russia is withdrawn. IBM made the announcement on March 7. There will be no substitute story.

Title: For hype-wary IBM, quantum-computing sales are close, but not too close
Short Description: IBM has set a new goal for propelling the legacy technology company ahead of its rivals: a quantum computer ready for commercial use, three years from now.

Title: IBM unsure how long it will keep Russia-based staff on payroll, CEO says
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp is not sure how much longer it can pay its employees in Russia in light of escalating sanctions on the country, its chief executive told Reuters.

Title: IBM forecasts upbeat 2022 revenue on cloud strength; flags Russia hit
Short Description: IBM said on Tuesday it expects to hit the top end of its revenue growth forecast for 2022 even as it accounted for a hit of a "few hundred million dollars" from the suspension of its business in Russia.

Title: IBM's Jim Whitehurst to step down as president
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp (IBM.N) said on Friday President Jim Whitehurst, who played a major role in Big Blue's $34 billion acquisition of Red Hat two years ago, will step down from his position.

Title: IBM explores AI tools to spot, cut bias in online ad targeting
Short Description: IBM Corp (IBM.N) is developing tools that would ensure online advertising algorithms do not unfairly show ads to only specific groups such as mostly men or wealthy people, aiming to address discrimination concerns that have drawn industrywide scrutiny.

Title: GlobalFoundries seeks ruling in IBM contract dispute
Short Description: Semiconductor manufacturer GlobalFoundries on Monday sued International Business Machines Corp (IBM.N), asking a judge to rule that it did not violate a contract with the U.S. company which claims it is owed $2.5 billion in damages.

Title: IBM to focus on AI and hybrid cloud in new chapter for Big Blue
Short Description: IBM (IBM.N) is rolling out innovations in artificial intelligence, hybrid cloud operations and quantum computing as the company that created the personal computer follows through on a roadmap it set out a year ago.

Title: IBM unveils 2-nanometer chip technology for faster computing
Short Description: For decades, each generation of computer chips got faster and more power-efficient because their most basic building blocks, called transistors, got smaller.

Title: IBM quarterly sales growth highest in over two years on cloud strength
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp (IBM.N) recorded highest quarterly sales growth in more two years and beat Wall Street targets on Monday, boosted by its bets in the high-margin cloud computing business.

Title: IBM to name infrastructure services business 'Kyndryl' after spinoff
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp said on Monday its managed infrastructure services business would be called "Kyndryl" after a planned spinoff into a public company later this year.

Title: German process mining startup Celonis teams up with IBM and Red Hat
Short Description: Celonis, a fast-growing German process mining software startup, has struck a strategic partnership with IBM to help companies make the most of the digital transformation that many are undergoing at speed.

Title: Moderna, IBM team up on COVID-19 vaccine distribution data
Short Description: Vaccine maker Moderna Inc and IBM Corp said on Thursday they would work together on technologies to track COVID-19 vaccine administration.

Title: IBM revenue disappoints as software sales mark rare decline
Short Description: IBM Corp missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, hurt by a rare sales decline in its software unit as clients shied away from longer-term deals due to pandemic-induced economic uncertainty.

Title: IBM names head of new IT infrastructure services company
Short Description: IBM Corp on Thursday named former financial chief Martin Schroeter to head its new IT infrastructure services unit when it becomes public, as the 109-year old company shifts gears to focus on its high-margin cloud business.

Title: Ex-Trump adviser Cohn joins IBM as vice chairman
Short Description: Gary Cohn, the former economic adviser to U.S. President Donald Trump and ex-Goldman Sachs Group Inc (GS.N) president, has been named as vice chairman of International Business Machines (IBM.N), the technology giant said on Tuesday.

Title: Ex-Trump adviser Cohn joins IBM as vice chairman
Short Description: Gary Cohn, the former economic adviser to U.S. President Donald Trump and ex-Goldman Sachs Group Inc president, has been named as vice chairman of International Business Machines, the technology giant said on Tuesday.

Title: IBM will pay $24.25 million to resolve FCC probes
Short Description: IBM Corp has agreed to pay $24.25 million to resolve a pair of investigations by the Federal Communications Commission(FCC) over subsidies awarded to connect schools and libraries to broadband.

Title: IBM to buy European cloud startup Nordcloud
Short Description: International Business Machines will acquire European startup Nordcloud, the latest in a series of acquisitions for the 109-year old firm preparing a mega spin-off to focus on cloud computing.

Title: IBM CEO Arvind Krishna to take over as chairman
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp said on Wednesday Chief Executive Officer Arvind Krishna would take over as chairman from Jan. 1, replacing Ginni Rometty, who stepped down as its long-time CEO earlier this year.

Title: Samsung ties up with IBM to combine private 5G with "edge computing"
Short Description: Samsung Electronics on Wednesday signed a partnership with IBM to combine "edge computing" with private 5G networks, the latest tie-up among big technology firms trying to help customers automate production.

Title: Samsung ties up with IBM to combine private 5G with "edge computing"
Short Description: Samsung Electronics (005930.KS) on Wednesday signed a partnership with IBM (IBM.N) to combine "edge computing" with private 5G networks, the latest tie-up among big technology firms trying to help customers automate production.

Title: IBM posts double-digit cloud revenue growth; says customers deferring some projects
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> edged past Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Monday, bolstered by higher demand for its cloud services, a business it is staking its future on as it prepares to spin off one of its legacy units.

Title: IBM revenue edges past estimates on cloud strength
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp edged past Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Monday, bolstered by strong demand for its cloud computing services from companies speeding up their digital shift due to the coronavirus pandemic.

Title: IBM revenue edges past estimates on cloud strength
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp edged past Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Monday, bolstered by strong demand for its cloud computing services from companies speeding up their digital shift due to the coronavirus pandemic.

Title: Esports-IBM inks first-ever esports deal with OWL
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> will make its bow in the esports industry after signing a multi-year deal with the Overwatch League, the world's first global esports league with city-based teams across Asia, Europe, and North America.

Title: IBM to break up 109-year old company to focus on cloud growth
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp is splitting itself into two public companies, capping a years-long effort by the world's first big computing firm to diversify away from its legacy businesses to focus on high-margin cloud computing.

Title: IBM to separately list Managed Infrastructure Services unit
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp will separate the Managed Infrastructure Services unit of its Global Technology Services division into a new public company, it said on Thursday. (Reporting by Munsif Vengattil in Bengaluru; Editing by Ramakrishnan M.)

Title: IBM to separately list Managed Infrastructure Services unit
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp will separate the Managed Infrastructure Services unit of its Global Technology Services division into a new public company, it said on Thursday. (Reporting by Munsif Vengattil in Bengaluru; Editing by Ramakrishnan M.)

Title: IBM says U.S. should adopt new export controls on facial recognition systems
Short Description: IBM Corp <IBM.N> said on Friday the U.S. Commerce Department should adopt new controls to limit the export of facial recognition systems to repressive regimes that can be used to commit human rights violations.

Title: Eying digital push, Schlumberger strikes cloud-computing deal with IBM
Short Description: Top oilfield service provider Schlumberger NV said Tuesday it will tap technology from International Business Machines Corp to bring oilfield software to countries such as Saudi Arabia and Russia that have strict data sovereignty laws.

Title: Eying digital push, Schlumberger strikes cloud-computing deal with IBM
Short Description: Top oilfield service provider Schlumberger NV said Tuesday it will tap technology from International Business Machines Corp to bring oilfield software to countries such as Saudi Arabia and Russia that have strict data sovereignty laws.

Short Description: Top oilfield service provider Schlumberger NV said Tuesday it will tap technology from International Business Machines Corp to bring oilfield software to countries such as Saudi Arabia and Russia that have strict data sovereignty laws.

Title: IBM rolls out newest processor chip, taps Samsung for manufacturing
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> announced on Monday a new processor chip for data centers that it says will be able to handle three times the workload of its predecessor.

Title: IBM partners with Japanese business, academia in quantum computing
Short Description: U.S. tech firm International Business Machines Corp on Thursday launched a research partnership with Japanese industry to accelerate advances in quantum computing, deepening ties between the two countries in an emerging and sensitive field.

Title: Adobe, IBM team up on marketing software for banking industry
Short Description: Adobe Inc <ADBE.O> and International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> said on Tuesday they are teaming up to make marketing software easier to use for banks that face strict controls on how customer data must be handled.

Title: IBM beats estimates; sees gains as customers accelerate shift to cloud
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> beat estimates for second-quarter profit on Monday and signaled that demand in its cloud computing business would get a boost as large corporations accelerate their digital shift due to the coronavirus crisis.

Title: IBM earnings beat estimates on cloud strength
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp posted quarterly revenue and profit above analysts' estimates on Monday, riding on the strength of its high-margin cloud computing business.

Short Description: International Business Machines a annoncé lundi avoir décidé de ne plus offrir de logiciel de reconnaissance faciale dans une lettre demandant des efforts vers plus de justice et d'équité raciale envoyée au Congrès américain.

Title: IBM exits facial recognition business, calls for police reform
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> disclosed Monday it will no longer offer facial recognition or analysis software in a letter to Congress calling for new efforts to pursue justice and racial equity, new Chief Executive Officer Arvind Krishna said.

Title: IBM gets out of facial recognition business
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp will no longer offer general purpose facial recognition or analysis software, new Chief Executive Officer Arvind Krishna said in a letter to the members of the United States Congress on Monday.

Title: IBM sees shift in client spend priorities, withdraws annual forecast
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp's <IBM.N> clients have shifted priorities toward saving capital in recent weeks because of COVID-19, hitting software sales in particular, new Chief Executive Officer Arvind Krishna said as the company withdrew its 2020 annual forecast.

Title: IBM misses revenue estimates but cloud jumps; withdraws forecast
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp posted quarterly revenue slightly lower than Wall Street expected, but beat profit targets as sales in its high-margin cloud computing business rose 19%.

Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> on Monday named former Bank of America Corp <BAC.N> top technology executive Howard Boville head of its cloud business, as Arvind Krishna takes over from long-time chief Ginni Rometty.

Title: IBM withdraws from RSA conference over coronavirus fears
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> on Friday said it had canceled its participation in the RSA cyber security conference due to coronavirus-related concerns.

Title: IBM's 'surprise' CEO: Arvind Krishna to take over from Ginni Rometty
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp's <IBM.N> Ginni Rometty, the first woman chief executive of the tech pioneer, will be replaced in April by the head of its fast-growing cloud business, Arvind Krishna.

Title: IBM CEO Rometty to step down; cloud boss to succeed
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> Chief Executive Officer Ginni Rometty will hand over the reins to the head of the company's cloud business, as the pioneer tech company continues its efforts to rejuvenate itself.

Title: REFILE-IBM long-time CEO Ginni Rometty to step down; Arvind Krishna to succeed
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp said on Thursday its long-time chief executive officer Ginni Rometty was stepping down from the role and will be succeeded by the head of its cloud business Arvind Krishna, effective April.

Title: U.S. Supreme Court tosses lower court ruling that allowed IBM retirement fund suit
Short Description: The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday threw out a lower court ruling that allowed a lawsuit to proceed against managers of a retirement fund for IBM Corp employees centering on allegations that officials failed to disclose that IBM's microelectronics business was over-valued.

Title: IBM's new battery design taps seawater as alternative mineral source
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp said on Wednesday it has created a battery design that uses materials extracted from seawater and requires no cobalt, as the race to find alternative sources to the expensive mineral intensifies.

Title: Yara, IBM to offer digital services to farmers
Short Description: Fertilizer maker Yara International and IBM plan to launch digital farming services later this year to help boost crop yields, eventually targeting 100 million hectares, or close to 7 percent of arable land worldwide, they said.

Title: Exclusive: China hacked HPE, IBM and then attacked clients - sources
Short Description: Hackers working on behalf of China's Ministry of State Security breached the networks of Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co and IBM, then used the access to hack into their clients' computers, according to five sources familiar with the attacks.

Title: At patent trial, Groupon casts IBM as shaking down other tech companies
Short Description: A lawyer for discount e-commerce company Groupon Inc told a court in Delaware on Thursday that International Business Machines Corp has shaken down practically every large tech firm for patent fees.

Title: IBM gets boost from new businesses, tops estimates
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> on Wednesday reported second-quarter profit and revenue that topped analysts' expectations as it benefited from growth in higher-margin businesses including cybersecurity and cloud computing.

Title: IBM partners Stronghold for new digital stable coin
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> is backing a new cryptocurrency pegged to the U.S. dollar, in a partnership with U.S.-based financial services provider Stronghold that adds stability to a sector known for its volatility, the companies said.

Title: IBM seeks $167 million from Groupon in dispute over early internet patents
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp on Monday asked a U.S. jury to award it $167 million in a lawsuit accusing e-commerce marketplace operator Groupon Inc of using patented technology without authorization.

Title: IBM first-quarter margins miss estimates, shares fall
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> posted profit margins that fell short of Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, a sign that its reinvention was taking time.

Title: IBM reports 5 pct rise in quarterly revenue
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp reported a 5 percent rise in first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, benefiting from its shift to cloud computing and security services.

Title: IBM joins group building a blockchain-based global identity network
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp has joined a private, non-profit organization called Sovrin Foundation that is seeking to build a global decentralized identity system based on blockchain technology.

Title: IBM settles legal dispute with diversity officer hired by Microsoft
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp on Monday said it settled a trade secrets lawsuit it brought against its former chief diversity officer who left for a similar job at Microsoft Corp.

Title: Major firms learning to adapt in fight against start-ups: IBM
Short Description: Major corporations are learning to defend against start-ups that threaten their business models, hitting back by adopting the disruptors' playbook, according to a survey of top executives by computer services firm IBM.

Title: IBM sues former HR boss hired by Microsoft
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> sued its former executive Lindsay-Rae McIntyre, who was named Microsoft Corp's <MSFT.O> new chief diversity officer over the weekend, alleging violation of a one-year non-competitive agreement.

Title: Ex-IBM employee from China gets five years prison for stealing code
Short Description: A former software engineer for IBM in China was sentenced to five years in prison after he pleaded guilty to stealing proprietary source code from the company, prosecutors announced on Friday.

Title: IBM shares fall on soft profit outlook
Short Description: Shares in International Business Machines fell 2.6 percent on Friday as analysts judged a "disappointing" full-year profit forecast showed that the company would take more time to get back on a path of steady growth.

Title: IBM returns to growth after six years, but dour forecast hits shares
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp's <IBM.N> revenue rose for the first time in 23 quarters, beating analysts' estimates, but the company warned that a higher tax rate this year would eat into its profit.

Title: Maersk, IBM to launch blockchain-based platform for global trade
Short Description: The world's largest container shipping firm A.P. Moller-Maersk is teaming up with IBM to create an industry-wide trading platform it says can speed up trade and save billions of dollars.

Title: IBM names James Kavanaugh as CFO, replacing Schroeter
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp said on Thursday Chief Financial Officer Martin Schroeter will move to a new role and will be replaced by company veteran James Kavanaugh, effective Jan. 11.

Title: IBM could be set for gains after long slump: Barron's
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> could be the next blue-chip company with a rising valuation, according to a report in financial publication Barron's.

Title: Light Street Capital's Kacher bets on further drop in IBM stock
Short Description: NEW YORK - One of the top-performing hedge funds of the year is betting that shares of International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> have further to fall.

Title: IBM urges lawmakers to 'narrow' bill targeting Chinese investment
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp has urged lawmakers to use a different strategy than toughening foreign investment rules because of U.S. concerns about Chinese military actions and intellectual property theft, according to a letter seen by Reuters on Tuesday.

Title: Banks' blockchain consortium picks IBM for trade finance platform
Short Description: Tech giant IBM is building a blockchain-based platform for seven big European banks, including HSBC and Deutsche Bank, that is aimed at simplifying trade finance transactions for small- and medium-sized companies.

Title: BRIEF-IBM says companies using Cisco UCS servers can now manage data intensive workloads on-premises with IBM COS
Short Description: * IBM says companies using Cisco UCS servers can now manage data intensive workloads securely, efficiently on-premises with IBM COS system Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

Title: BRIEF-IBM and Zain launch cloud disaster recovery service in Kuwait
Short Description: * IBM and Zain launch cloud disaster recovery service in Kuwait Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

Title: BRIEF-IBM says co, Hortonworks announced expansion to relationship
Short Description: * IBM- co, Hortonworks announced expansion to relationship focused on extending data science, machine learning to more developers, across apache hadoop ecosystem Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

Title: BRIEF-IBM and SAP collaborate to build new infrastructure for Helse Vest in Norway
Short Description: * IBM and SAP collaborate to build new infrastructure for Helse Vest in Norway

Title: BRIEF-IBM acquires TIMETOACT GROUP's XCC to launch IBM Connections Engagement Center
Short Description: * IBM acquires TIMETOACT GROUP's XCC to launch IBM Connections Engagement Center-- a single destination for internal communications, collaboration and employee engagement

Title: Ex-IBM employee from China pleads guilty to code theft charges
Short Description: A former software engineer for IBM in China pleaded guilty on Friday to stealing proprietary source code from the company, federal prosecutors announced on Friday.

Title: BRIEF-IBM Mobilefirst for ios apps to be launched on singapore airlines flights
Short Description: * Ibm mobilefirst for ios apps to be launched on singapore airlines flights Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

Title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-Warren Buffett says he sold a third of stake in IBM -CNBC
Short Description: Berkshire Hathaway's Warren Buffett has sold "a reasonable amount" of his stake in International Business Machines Corp after the stock crossed $180, CNBC reported.

Title: Warren Buffett says he sold a third of stake in IBM: CNBC
Short Description: Warren Buffett said he has sold about one-third of Berkshire Hathaway Inc's <BRKa.N> big stake in IBM Corp <IBM.N>, CNBC reported on Thursday, reducing a bet by the famed investor that surprised many and which so far has yet to prove successful.

Title: CORRECTED-Warren Buffett says he sold a third of stake in IBM - CNBC
Short Description: Berkshire Hathaway's Warren Buffett has sold about a third of his stake in IBM Corp during the first and second quarter of 2017, CNBC reported.

Title: BRIEF-IBM shareholders vote on executive compensation with 54.25 pct "for"
Short Description: * Shareholders vote on executive compensation with 54.25 percent "for" Source text:(http://bit.ly/2qo7P41) Further company coverage:

Title: BRIEF-IBM opens four new U.S. cloud data centers
Short Description: * Announced opening of four new IBM cloud data centers in the U.S.; two new facilities in Dallas and two new facilities in Washington, D.C. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

Title: BRIEF-IBM says declares quarterly cash dividend of $1.50per share, 7 pct increase
Short Description: * Ibm board approves increase in quarterly cash dividend for the 22nd consecutive year

Title: ABB, IBM team up on industrial artificial intelligence
Short Description: ABB has sealed a collaboration agreement with International Business Machines Corp, the Swiss engineering company said on Tuesday, the latest step in its efforts to ramp up its presence in digital technology and the internet of things.

Title: IBM's cloud provides little silver lining
Short Description: IBM's cloud provides little silver lining. Big Blue fell short of investor expectations and reported its 20th consecutive quarter of falling revenue. Boss Ginni Rometty keeps talking up artificial intelligence and remote servers and services. Competition, however, may prove...

Title: IBM posts first revenue miss in five quarters, shares tumble
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> reported a bigger-than-expected decline in revenue for the first time in five quarters due to weak demand in its IT services business, a sign that the company's turnaround could take longer than expected.

Title: BRIEF-IBM and Hejia launch blockchain-based supply chain financial services platform
Short Description: * IBM and Hejia launch blockchain-based supply chain financial services platform for pharmaceutical procurement Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

Title: IBM launches enterprise-ready blockchain service
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp has launched a service that will allow businesses to build applications on its cloud using blockchain code from the Hyperledger Project, the cross-industry group led by the Linux Foundation.

Title: BRIEF-IBM, SecureKey to deliver blockchain-based digital identity network for consumers
Short Description: * IBM and Securekey Technologies to deliver blockchain-based digital identity network for consumers

Title: IBM and Wanda form China cloud computing partnership
Short Description: IBM and a unit of China's Dalian Wanda Group, a property and entertainment conglomerate, agreed on Sunday to team up to provide cloud services to Chinese companies, the U.S. technology provider said.

Title: IBM to integrate MedyMatch technology to help spot brain bleeding
Short Description: Israel's MedyMatch Technology said on Thursday IBM Watson Health would integrate MedyMatch's technology into its offerings to imaging experts in hospitals to help doctors identify intracranial bleeding from head trauma and stroke.

Title: BRIEF-IBM CEO Rometty's FY 2016 total compensation $32.7 mln vs $19.8 mln in FY 2015
Short Description: * CEO Rometty's fy 2016 total compensation $32.7 million versus $19.8 million in fy 2015 - sec filing

Title: BRIEF-IBM and Salesforce announce global strategic partnership
Short Description: * IBM - partnership will bring new insights from Watson directly into the Salesforce intelligent customer success platform Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

Title: IBM, Maersk in blockchain tie-up for shipping industry
Short Description: IBM and Danish transport company Maersk said they were working together to digitize, manage, and track shipping transactions using blockchain technology.

Title: BRIEF-IBM building first universal quantum computers for business, science
Short Description: * IBM building first universal quantum computers for business and science

Title: IBM revenue fall dims upbeat profit forecast
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp reported its 19th straight quarter of declining revenue, but forecast full-year earnings above Wall Street estimates due to growth in newer areas such as cloud-based services and analytics.

Title: IBM promises to hire Americans as tech executives set to meet Trump
Short Description: IBM Chief Executive Ginni Rometty pledged to hire and train workers in the United States as she and other technology executives prepared to meet on Wednesday with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump.

Title: IBM invests in UK data centers as tech sector defies Brexit worries
Short Description: Global IT group IBM <IBM.N> will triple the number of its cloud data centers in Britain, it said on Tuesday, joining Facebook and Google in investing in the UK after its vote to leave the European Union.

Title: Thai Kasikornbank, IBM join forces on blockchain network
Short Description: Thailand's Kasikornbank Pcl has joined with the Thai unit of International Business Machines Corp to develop blockchain services in a bid to save costs and speed up transaction process, the companies said on Thursday.

Title: GM's OnStar, IBM's Watson combine to market brands to drivers
Short Description: General Motors Co and International Business Machines Corp on Tuesday said they would combine IBM's artificial intelligence software Watson with the carmaker's OnStar system in order to market services to drivers in their vehicles.

Title: IBM apologizes for Australian e-census bungle, setting off blame game
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp apologized to Australia on Tuesday for what the government has described as a "malicious" cyber-attack that shut down a national census, but blamed two domestic internet providers for the security lapse.

Title: IBM, Walmart, university to put Chinese food products on blockchain
Short Description: IBM, U.S. retailer Walmart and Tsinghua University on Wednesday announced a joint effort to track the movement of food products in China using blockchain technology to improve food safety in the world's second-largest economy.

Title: IBM third quarter revenue falls, but tops forecasts on cloud, analytics growth
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp posted better-than-expected third-quarter revenue on Tuesday, helped by growth in the company's cloud and analytics businesses.

Title: IBM sees tipping point at hand for industrial Internet
Short Description: (This October 3 story was corrected to show growth figure excludes acquisitions in final paragraph)

Title: Banks adopting blockchain 'dramatically faster' than expected: IBM
Short Description: Banks and other financial institutions are adopting blockchain technology "dramatically faster" than initially expected, with 15 percent of top global banks intending to roll out full-scale, commercial blockchain products in 2017, IBM said on Wednesday.

Title: IBM, China UnionPay complete block chain pilot project on bank loyalty points
Short Description: IBM <IBM.N> said on Friday it completed a pilot project with Chinese credit card company China UnionPay that will facilitate the sharing of loyalty bonus points among banks using block chain technology.

Title: IBM's full-year earnings forecast greeted with skepticism
Short Description: IBM Corp <IBM.N> has given itself a tall order - a full-year profit target many analysts think it will have trouble meeting.

Title: IBM revenue beats estimates as shift to cloud pays off
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp's quarterly revenue beat analysts' expectations as the company's shift to high-growth areas such as cloud-based services begins to yield results.

Title: IBM to open first blockchain innovation center in Singapore
Short Description: IBM plans to open a blockchain innovation center in Singapore in collaboration with the government, as the city-state strives to become Asia's main financial technology hub.

Title: Groupon sues 'once-great' IBM over patent
Short Description: The online marketplace Groupon Inc has sued IBM Corp, accusing it of infringing a patent related to technology that helps businesses solicit customers based on the customers' locations at a given moment.

Title: Online retailer Yoox Net-a-Porter adopts IBM software
Short Description: Online fashion retailer Yoox Net-a-Porter said on Monday it would adopt IBM's software to manage orders, replacing technology developed by Yoox and Net-a-Porter prior to their merger in October.

Title: IBM sues Groupon over alleged patent infringement
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp filed a lawsuit on Wednesday against daily deals website operator Groupon Inc alleging infringement of its patents.

Title: N.Y. brokers lose SEC insider trading trial over IBM deal tip
Short Description: A federal jury on Monday found two former New York stockbrokers liable for trading on confidential tips about an IBM Corp <IBM.N> acquisition, despite a major appeals court ruling that made insider trading cases harder to pursue.

Title: IBM to purchase cyber security firm Resilient Systems
Short Description: IBM Security plans to acquire private cyber security firm Resilient Systems, the computing giant said Monday, as part of a move to expand its role in the incident response market.

Title: SEC asks jurors to find New York brokers liable for insider trading
Short Description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission urged jurors on Friday to hold two former New York stockbrokers liable for insider trading, in a test of its ability to pursue such cases after an appellate court's ruling reshaped the law.

Title: IBM inks deal with VMWare, tries to bolster cloud credentials
Short Description: Computing giant IBM <IBM.N> has expanded its partnership with VMWare <VMW.N>, one of several initiatives it plans to announce Monday as it works to carve out a bigger role in the fast-growing field of cloud computing.

Title: N.Y. stockbrokers' trades on IBM deal tip not illegal, jurors told
Short Description: Lawyers for two former Wall Street stockbrokers urged jurors on Tuesday to reject a U.S. regulator's claims they illicitly traded on a tip about an IBM Corp deal, saying their conduct did not constitute illegal insider trading.

Title: N.Y. stockbrokers to face trial in SEC insider trading case
Short Description: U.S. securities regulators are set to take two former stockbrokers to trial in a case that tests the ability of authorities to pursue insider trading charges after an appellate court's ruling reshaped the law.

Title: Ford CEO joins IBM board as auto industry transforms
Short Description: Ford Motor Co Chief Executive Mark Fields is joining IBM's board of directors as the No. 2 U.S. automaker explores alternative mobility options beyond selling cars and trucks.

Title: IBM granted most U.S. patents in 2015, study finds
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> was granted the most U.S. patents for the 23rd year in a row in 2015, according to a ranking by patent analysis firm IFI Claims Patents Services.

Title: Ex-IBM employee from China arrested in U.S. for code theft
Short Description: A former software engineer for IBM Corp in China has been arrested by U.S. authorities for allegedly stealing proprietary source code from his former employer, prosecutors announced on Tuesday.

Title: New apps to help business get in step with mobile customers
Short Description: Nine months after Apple and IBM began working together on building mobile apps for businesses, some of the first fruits are about to appear at UK pharmacy chain Boots, which has begun equipping store employees with iPads to serve shoppers in the aisles.

Title: Exclusive: IBM looking at adopting bitcoin technology for major currencies
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp is considering adopting the underlying technology behind bitcoin, known as the "blockchain," to create a digital cash and payment system for major currencies, according to a person familiar with the matter.

Title: IBM shareholder sues company, alleging it overvalued chip unit
Short Description: IBM Corp was sued on Monday by a shareholder that said it committed securities fraud by failing to write down a money-losing semiconductor unit before agreeing to pay another company $1.5 billion to take that unit off its hands.

Title: IBM sues Priceline for patent infringement in U.S. court
Short Description: IBM filed a lawsuit against Priceline Group Inc on Monday, accusing it of infringing four IBM patents in running its travel and dining websites.

Title: IBM profit forecast, fourth-quarter revenue below estimates
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp posted a new 2015 profit target and quarterly revenue that both missed analysts' estimates, as the one-time world technology leader continues to grapple with its journey from low-margin hardware maker to the new world of cloud computing.Shares...

Title: IBM says cloud business enjoying 'breakthrough year'
Short Description: IBM aims to expand the number of data centers it offers clients around the world by 25 percent to meet fast-rising demand for internet-based services, after what a company executive said has been a "breakthrough year" in 2014 for its cloud computing business.

Title: IBM signs $1.25 billion WPP cloud deal and says more coming
Short Description: IBM is enjoying a wave of major technology outsourcing deals from European customers in the fourth quarter and the new contract signings are not over yet, an executive for the computer services giant said in an interview.

Title: Iusacell's $2.5 billion suit against IBM on hold due to arbitration
Short Description: A U.S. judge on Friday put on hold a $2.5 billion lawsuit by Mexican mobile phone operator Iusacell SA de CV accusing IBM Corp of fraudulent misrepresentations, citing a pending arbitration launched by the U.S. technology giant.

Title: Exclusive: Apple's enterprise assault gets into higher gear
Short Description: Apple Inc <AAPL.O> is embarking on its most aggressive expansion yet onto corporate turf, hiring a dedicated sales force to talk with potential clients like Citigroup Inc <C.N> and working in concert with a dozen or so developers, two sources familiar with its plans say.

Title: IBM, Twitter to partner on business data analytics
Short Description: International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N> on Wednesday announced a partnership with Twitter <TWTR.N> to help shape business decisions using data collected from tweets worldwide.

Title: IBM says Mexico's Iusacell sued to avoid complying with contract
Short Description: IBM Corp on Wednesday blasted a lawsuit filed by Mexican mobile phone operator Iusacell against the U.S. technology company as a "transparent attempt" to avoid complying with contractual obligations.

Title: Mexican mobile phone operator sues IBM for $2.5 billion
Short Description: Mexican mobile phone operator Iusacell SA de CV sued IBM Corp on Wednesday, accusing the U.S. technology giant of making fraudulent representations that caused it to lose $2.5 billion in profits.

Title: IBM OKs another $15 bln for share buybacks
Short Description: IBM has approved another $15 billion for share buybacks on top of about $5.6 billion set aside previously and left over from an earlier authorization, helping its shares gain 2 percent on Tuesday.
